SEARCH
Package com.example.app

Class MenuController.IngredientUsage

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.MenuController.IngredientUsage
Enclosing class:
MenuController
public class MenuController.IngredientUsage extends Object
Represents ingredient usage information for seasonal menu items.

This inner class stores all relevant data for an ingredient including inventory information (on hand, required, unit, price) and usage information (amount used per serving). All properties are stored as editable strings for TableView compatibility.

  • Constructor Details

    • IngredientUsage

      public IngredientUsage(String ingredientName, String amountOnHand, String amountRequired, String unit, String pricePerUnit, String amountUsed)
      Constructs a new IngredientUsage instance with all inventory and usage details.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingredient
      amountOnHand - the current inventory quantity (as string)
      amountRequired - the minimum required quantity (as string)
      unit - the unit of measurement (e.g., "oz", "lbs")
      pricePerUnit - the cost per unit (as string)
      amountUsed - the amount used per serving of the menu item (as string)
